#summary zTag has the following requirements

= Requirements =

  * PHP >=5.2(<5.2 needs to be verified)
  * For Web Frontend:
    * Apache or compatible with rewrite module + php5 support

= Database drivers =

The database driver right for your database connection to work, the zTag DB driver works with following databases:
 
  * OCI        - Oracle 10g (<10 needs to be verified)
  * MSSQL      - Microsoft SQL Server 2005
  * MySQL      - MySQL >= 5
  * Firebird   - 
  * PostgreSQL - 
  * SQLite     -
